news.title: Belle & Sebastian announce back-to-back Dublin shows
EDEN announces Dublin show
news.summary: He will play The Academy on March 14, 2026.

news.title: August A&R Department: Lauren Wallace, Diveboy, Gush & more
news.summary: From teenage alt. pop sensations and soul-drenched Americana to all-guitars blazing grunge and euphoric trance from up Louth way, this is another great month for new Irish music

news.title: Some Neck: The guitarist’s guitar shop finds a new home on Francis Street
news.summary: Some Neck Guitars in Dublin has one of the city’s most humorous double-entendres as a moniker. Following the opening of its new premises on Francis Street, it’s a good time to highlight owner Owen McQuail’s unique eye for the finest vintage guitars available in Ireland…

news.title: Culture Night Dublin 2025 programme announced featuring Grooveline, Farah Elle and Zetra
news.summary: This year marks the 20th edition of Culture Night Dublin

news.title: Oasis Live '25 pop-up shop in Dublin extends dates due to continued demand
news.summary: After Oasis fans ‘Let There Be Love’ at the band's two ‘Supersonic’ Croke Park shows, Dublin’s official Oasis Live '25 Fan Store isn’t ready to ‘Fade Away’ just yet. The shop will ‘Roll With It’ and remain open until August 23.

news.title: Florence + The Machine announce new album Everybody Scream
news.summary: The record will be released on October 31.

news.title: Reactions pour in as UK government warns Sally Rooney could face arrest under Terrorism Act for support of Palestine Action
news.summary: The BBC has faced pressure from pro-Israel organisations to pull TV adaptions of Rooney's novels Normal People and Conversations with Friends from their platform.

news.title: Ozzy Osbourne documentary pulled from BBC schedule due to family request
news.summary: "We are respecting the family’s wishes to wait a bit longer before airing this very special film,” said the BBC.

news.title: Ukrainian language film Sanatorium to represent Ireland for International Feature Film Oscar
news.summary: See the trailer for IFTA's pick below.
